Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Techsavy
Reviews.Content: "I looked on the Amazon site for a number of Android smartphones  ended up paying a fortune only to return them back.This phone hit the spot the moment it came out of the box.The appearance was good colors nice and clear and the screen a super capacitiveone.I have already downloaded a number of my favourite apps and enjoying every moment of it.The price was amazing for a huge 5 screen decent android smartphone.The only drawback being the inbuilt memory.I didnt waste any time getting a 4gigs tf card and now that part is also taken care of.A highly recommended phone for someone who wants to own a decent Android phone at a throwaway price.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this phone!
Reviews.Author: BigDee
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  This is my first smartphone, (My friends got tired of me messing with theirs!) and I couldn't have made a better choice.  The only drawback I have is the small inbuilt memory, which frankly, is no hardship.  The sharpness of the screen colors and graphics blew my mind.  Now my friend want to play around with MY phone.  The sound is clear and perfect.  Apps perform smoothly and with no issues.I would definitely recommend this product.  I've already purchased another one for one of my close friends.

Reviews.Title: This my rating for the phone,thankyou
Reviews.Author: soilo velasquez
Reviews.Content: The phone is nice but band #2 don't work good every time I put a sim in it the person on the other side of the call can't hear me the noise is ugly it sounds like I am in a engine room but band#1 is good nice phone I like it that's the only issue I got with it.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY - specs lie!
Reviews.Author: Brian Fath
Reviews.Content: Firstly, this phone REALLY has 512MB onboard storage, Android Gingerbread skinned to look like ICS. It has an unremoveable "playApp" store, which Windows Defender has identified as malware/spyware. Constant buzzing noise when making calls, as reported by a few other reviewers. Completely unusable and possibly spying on user.  I have NEVER had this many issues with a phone. Sent it back after 2 days. I feel this HEAVILY modded version of Android (not to mention the device itself, which came with parts of the word "android" scratched out) was created by a desperate hermitted programmer in his mother's basement. NEGATIVE 5 STARS!

Reviews.Title: I loved the size of this phone
Reviews.Author: Crabhappy "KIS"
Reviews.Content: This phone is a very nice size. Was a generac  Samsung Galaxy. Great screen. The problem that I had was that I though it would work on the AT&T; Network. It didn't. Thanks to Amazon they refunded my money on this phone and they did it fast. Amazon is great about doing this.

Reviews.Title: This phone is a joke!!!
Reviews.Author: jENNIFER
Reviews.Content: The phone is 2g that's why nobody can hear you talk,,,,,,,,,so ridiculous. who uses a 2g phone anyways? I guess the people in hong kong do because that's where the phone comes from.

Reviews.Title: Very Good!
Reviews.Author: Natalia Mejia
Reviews.Content: Phone is excelent but android version is not compatible with Blackberry messenger. look like the original one! i like it!

Reviews.Title: BAD ITEM
Reviews.Author: Twum Barima
Reviews.Content: This product is the most useless item I have purchase and I will never recomend it to anybodybecause it can't connect to the network and I don't even know how to discribe it they should justtake it off market ASAP

Reviews.Title: confused
Reviews.Author: Joan Tribble
Reviews.Content: Even with the video, I wouldn't of been able to use it until my son helped me. Otherwise. it seems to be great!

Reviews.Title: We all love the LA9500 one of the best selling smart phones on the market today.
Reviews.Author: Woodrow M.
Reviews.Content: It your a smart phone user this the on for business and play and on to go at any time.

Reviews.Title: wish it lasted longer...
Reviews.Author: Sarah Hays
Reviews.Content: had it for a week and It shattered! I was so up set. If you get a phone mske sure it comes with a warranty.

Reviews.Title: False advertisement
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: The phone is extremely slow. The camera sucked the focus was horrible.i was not happy with the phone.battery life is horrible.

Reviews.Title: ehh
Reviews.Author: vicktoria
Reviews.Content: The phone works and is able to be used with our provider. We can't accept pictures or send emails and the internet is really slow. But if you are needing a phone it works.

Reviews.Title: dated
Reviews.Author: Lozita King
Reviews.Content: Its has dated software, other than that its okay if you can't afford the real deal. its not very combative.

Reviews.Title: im not as happy with it as i thought it would be.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: There's no predictive text, and Chinese wrighting pops up. The top bar on my phone disappears the alarms won't shut off and the phone says no service sometimes.

Reviews.Title: return
Reviews.Author: Michelle A.
Reviews.Content: the cell phone service that i use did  not want to activiate the phone so i send the phone back.

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: codi butler
Reviews.Content: ive had this phone for a month and have had nothing but problems it does not work half the time bad service and the charging docket has broken

Reviews.Title: This phone is a JOKE!!!
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: It freezes and the battery does not keep charged for long, you cant load apps the way you want to and it says it's an ANDROID....@!#$/..*&^@

Reviews.Title: Lightahead LA9500 5.0" Unlocked Cell phone is Defective
Reviews.Author: Rose Rowe
Reviews.Content: This phone is inexpensive, has a great look but defective. No one can hear you when you use it to make a call. I tried two different ones and it was the same thing.

Reviews.Title: not a good choice unless you are going for looks
Reviews.Author: Lakeyla Hopper
Reviews.Content: I originally thought i was purchasing a Samsung  galaxy 3 because that's what i typed in the search box but then when the phone arrived it looked like a galaxy note. The phone doesn't work well with the phone service i have , you can barely hear and the camera quality is horrible.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for T-Mobile ! luv it !
Reviews.Author: Chris Swiontek
Reviews.Content: wonderfull phone for t-mobile ! LOVE IT!  plug in sim and go =)  text/data/talk  worked right out of the box.for picture text you need to set your APN to this:  name:  T-mobile  apn  :  epc.tmobile.com  proxy:  <not set>  port  : <not set>  username:  <not set>  password:  <not set>  server: <not set.  mmsc:  [...]  mms proxy: <not set>  mms port :<not set>  mmc :310  mnc: 260  authentication type: <none>  apn type: default,supl,admin,dun,mms  apn protocol : ipv4/ipv6  then save , then reboot phone. DONE =)i recoment replacing the launcher with FTLLauncher.apk {free on app store no adds too!} it will  tripplet he speed of this phone and almost double the battery life , and install Super Tool Box .apk {free version on app store-but actually worthbuying the full )  great phone overall if you know what to do with it.  i definately recomend this phone to anybody who wants a good  t-mobile USA phone =) i use this phone every day and i luv  it !

Reviews.Title: gettinn a refundd
Reviews.Author: Aunique
Reviews.Content: Don't get this phone it takes for ever to charge. The phone has an horrible tower radio so it  Will block your sim card so you can't get it on the charger piece became loose easy and now  can't make calls don't buy this phone period point blank

Reviews.Title: NOT WORTH A TRY
Reviews.Author: Derrick Davis
Reviews.Content: i recieved this phone on a monday and it crashed on tuesday. it refuses to boot up and the battery doesnt even last a total of three hours. people are not lying with the previous reviews this phone is slow and laggy and it takes several minutes to download any app off the play store which isnt even installed with google play just a knockoff app store.i bought this phone for straight talk, reception for this phone is horriable never in my life have a seen a brand new phone take 2 minutes to load up your contact lists. this phone is junk. and is not really running a 4.2.2 android OS. dont waste your money. if your looking for a unlocked cell phone i suggest you look toward the highier priced phones.

Reviews.Title: Bad Battery!
Reviews.Author: Hilaire Ntiganzwa
Reviews.Content: This phone has a good look and nice features. But, it  a very bad battery. The battery does not last more than 4 hours even when you are not using it, just keeping it on.I would not buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Don't get it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Suzana
Reviews.Content: I hate the phone I just got it today and it's sucks I cryed all morning it's slow and can't do anything I hate it I hate I can't send it back I'm so upset!!

Reviews.Title: I need advice...QUICK
Reviews.Author: Antonio Bailey
Reviews.Content: Hi... I'm thinking about buying this phone but by the reviews I'm thinking not. Most of what the people are saying is the phone battery life last about 3 hours, barley any memory, and the apps take forever to download. I don't know if it's just your phone or every phone. If you have already bought this item and can give me good or bad news please contact me at antoniobailey@yahoo.com or by facebook. Please and thank you.

Reviews.Title: Not to Happy
Reviews.Author: Kiera
Reviews.Content: the phone is not what I thought it would be yes it is huge, but the phone is slow, loads slow, and dose not hold enough memory, I only down loaded two apps, and the phone is already telling me my memory is full I am thinking about returning it.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your time or money
Reviews.Author: pookie
Reviews.Content: If i could give this phone NO stars i would! This phone is so slow, when you TRY to call someone it force closes when you get a incomimg call it hangs up, it takes about a week to download a app hardly any internet service half the time it doesnt work, the phone is pretty thats about it because the most its good for is to put it on a shelf and look at it because its very very aggrevating when you cant even send a simple text message because closes text messaging out and brings you back to the home screen and you have to start theText all over again without even saving it as a draft i started having problems the first day. The best thing about this phone is the speaker is loud and the screen is big thats about.. Just about ready to throw the phone in the garbage because it does me no good!

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: terrence brown
Reviews.Content: The phone is no good,battery dies in minutes.freezes up too.overall it is not a good phone,is a piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied
Reviews.Author: Jamgirl
Reviews.Content: I received this item a month to this date and have not been able to use it and have not received the replacement batteries as promised. I find it distasteful that i have not be able to enjoy the phone i spent money. Both batteries doesn't last more than 30 minutes and i'm tired of waiting. I require a full refund as this phone is completely useless. My first negative experience shopping on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: phone looks great a little slow
Reviews.Author: knjkan
Reviews.Content: phone looks great but is a little slow and charger piece broke within 1 week,but looks like the galaxy 4

Reviews.Title: Worse phone ever
Reviews.Author: patriciarodriguez
Reviews.Content: Please don't ever buy this phone it's has no memory at all it eats battery like crazy and it has 3gb but it's slow it's not a joke

Reviews.Title: Horibble Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: They some how faked the Android version to show 4.2.2. but the phone is most likely Android 2.3+ Gingerbread. It has no Jelly bean features and the apps that require Android 4.0 or higher do not install. The recent apps is clearly pre Android 4.0. Other than that this is the worst Android device I have ever used. Slow and pure problems.

Reviews.Title: Awfull phone
Reviews.Author: Gus Cabana
Reviews.Content: This phone is really bad it doesn't work correctly and there's Asian writing all over the place. It has no know manufacture name you don't know who makes it. doesn't recognize the sim cards.

Reviews.Title: Not good _ Straight talk carrier
Reviews.Author: Tia
Reviews.Content: Omg, sound quality is TERRIBLE!!! Callers cannot  hear u there is always a buzzing noise that will Not..go away. Can only talk using headset for callers to hear u. Looks nice but not good at all..Internet is slow.'''until u cant use it. APPS doesnt work. Phone is Defective all around!Should have listened to reviews..Poor camera too, very slow n freezes a Whole lot! Cannot send nor rec picture msg.
